en:
趁
(Chèn)

take advantage of

Definitions of 趁
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

verb
    take advantage of
        利用, 趁, 借, 乘, 欺负, 凑
    avail oneself of
        趁, 乘, 假
    be possessed
        鬼迷心窍, 趁, 发疯
    be rich
        富于, 趁
